2021-11-26 17:26:02,501 - Statement Id: [M6720SelectMst] Prepared SQL: [SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NULL ORDER BY T2.ROUT_END_DT, T2.PROD_EQ_NO ,  T2.DY_NGT_FLG) AS RN        , CONVERT(VARCHAR,T2.ROUT_END_DT,23) AS MAKE_END_DT        , RIGHT(T2.PROD_EQ_NO,2) + '호기' AS EQ_NO        , CASE WHEN T2.DY_NGT_FLG = 'D' THEN '주간' ELSE '야간' END AS   DY_NGT_NM        , T3.MTRL_NM_CD    AS MDL_CD        , T2.MOLD_CD        , T3.N1ST_ITM_GRP_NM        , T3.N2ND_ITM_GRP_NM        , T5.ITM_SZ_NM        , T2.MOLD_SEQ  AS ITM_MOLD_SEQ        , T6.MOLD_CAPA_QTY        , T6.CYC_TIME        , 12           AS WRK_HRS        , T7.IDLE_MNT        , ROUND(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(MI, T2.ROUT_ST_DT, T2.ROUT_END_DT) / 60.0 <  0 THEN 0        ELSE DATEDIFF(MI, T2.ROUT_ST_DT, T2.ROUT_END_DT) / 60.0 END, 1) AS WRK_TM_VAL        , ROUND((ROUND(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(MI, T2.ROUT_ST_DT, T2.ROUT_END_DT) / 60.0 <  0 THEN 0        ELSE DATEDIFF(MI, T2.ROUT_ST_DT, T2.ROUT_END_DT) / 60.0 END, 1) / 12) * 100, 1) AS WRK_RT_VAL        , (CASE WHEN T2.ROUT_ST_DT IS NULL OR T2.ROUT_END_DT IS NULL  THEN '비가동' ELSE '가동' END ) AS WRK_FLG        , 3600 / (T6.MOLD_CAPA_QTY *  T6.CYC_TIME* 12)             AS PROD_TGT_QTY        , 3600 / (T6.MOLD_CAPA_QTY *  T6.CYC_TIME* 12) - ((T7.IDLE_MNT *60) / (T6.MOLD_CAPA_QTY *T6.CYC_TIME))    AS PROD_PLN_QTY        , T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY AS PROD_QTY        , T2.PROD_GD_QTY        , T9.BAD_QTY        , CASE WHEN (T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(T2.PROD_GD_QTY / (T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY) * 100, 1) END AS GD_RT        , CASE WHEN (T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(T9.BAD_QTY / (T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY) * 100, 1) END AS BAD_RT        , BAD_01_QTY        , BAD_02_QTY        , BAD_03_QTY        , BAD_04_QTY        , BAD_05_QTY        , BAD_06_QTY        , BAD_07_QTY        , BAD_08_QTY        , BAD_09_QTY        , T1.LOT_DIV_RMK  AS MM_RMK        , T2.JB_RMK   AS MM_12        FROM TB_PROD_LOT_DIV  T1        , TB_PROD_JB_ORD   T2        OUTER APPLY(        SELECT MAX(ISNULL(Z.ITM_NM, '') + '  ' + ISNULL(Z.N1ST_ITM_GRP_NM, '')) AS ITM_SZ_NM        FROM TB_PROD_JB_ITM X        , MV_TB_CD_ITM   Z        WHERE 1 = 1        AND X.CHNL_CD      =  @param0         AND X.CHNL_CD      = Z.CHNL_CD        AND X.LOT_DIV_NO   = T2.LOT_DIV_NO        AND X.LOT_DIV_SEQ  = T2.LOT_DIV_SEQ        AND X.ITM_CD       = Z.ITM_CD        ) T5        OUTER APPLY (        SELECT X.MOLD_CAPA_QTY        , X.CYC_TIME        FROM TB_PROD_MOLD_CD X        WHERE 1 = 1        AND X.CHNL_CD      =  @param0         AND X.MOLD_NO      = T2.MOLD_CD        AND X.MOLD_SEQ     = T2.MOLD_SEQ        ) T6        OUTER APPLY (        SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CAST(X.IDLE_MNT AS FLOAT)), 0) AS IDLE_MNT        FROM TB_PROD_CD_IDLE X        WHERE 1 = 1        AND X.CHNL_CD      =  @param0         AND X.LOT_DIV_NO   = T2.LOT_DIV_NO        AND X.LOT_DIV_SEQ  = T2.LOT_DIV_SEQ        ) T7        OUTER APPLY (        SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('7') THEN X.BAD_QTY END), 0)         AS BAD_01_QTY        , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('21') THEN X.BAD_QTY END), 0)        AS BAD_02_QTY        , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('23') THEN X.BAD_QTY END), 0)        AS BAD_03_QTY        , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('10', '11') THEN X.BAD_QTY END), 0)  AS BAD_04_QTY        , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('9') THEN          , ITM_SZ_NM                 , PUR_QTY                , IN_QTY                , RMN_QTY                , IN_RTE                , PUR_PRC                , RMN_AMT  PUR_AMT                      , CLZ_FLG           FROM (              SELECT  PUR_DT                    , PUR_ORD_NO                    , PUR_ORD_SEQ                    , PUR_CO_CD                    , PUR_CO_NM                    , ITM_CD                    , ITM_NM                    , ITM_SZ_NM                     , PUR_DUE_DT                    , PUR_QTY                    , PUR_PRC                     , PUR_AMT                    , IN_QTY                     , CASE WHEN IN_QTY = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(IN_AMT / IN_QTY , 0) END AS IN_PRC                           , IN_AMT                    , CASE WHEN CLZ_FLG = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE RMN_QTY END AS RMN_QTY                     , CASE WHEN RMN_QTY = 0 OR CLZ_FLG = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(RMN_AMT / RMN_QTY , 0) END AS RMN_PRC                     , CASE WHEN CLZ_FLG = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE RMN_AMT END AS RMN_AMT                     , IN_RTE                    , CLZ_FLG                    , isCheckd                    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NULL ORDER BY PUR_DT, PUR_ORD_NO, ITM_CD) AS RN                 FROM (                              SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NULL ORDER BY T1.PUR_DT, PUR_CO_CD, T1.PUR_ORD_NO, T1.PUR_ORD_SEQ) AS RN 0) -ISNULL(T1.IN_QTY, 0)    AS RMN_QTY                          , (ISNULL(T1.PUR_QTY, 0) -ISNULL(T1.IN_QTY, 0)) * T1.PUR_PRC   AS RMN_AMT                          , ISNULL(CASE WHEN T1.PUR_QTY = 0 THEN 0 ELSE   (ISNULL(T1.IN_QTY, 0) / T1.PUR_QTY) * 100 END, 0) AS IN_RTE                          , ISNULL(T4.ORD_CLZ_FLG, 'N') AS CLZ_FLG                          , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(T4.ORD_CLZ_FLG, 'N') = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS isCheckd                      FROM (                         SELECT T1.PUR_DT                        , T1.PUR_ORD_NO                        , T1.PUR_CO_CD 2021-11-29 09:41:33,608 - Statement Id: [M6720SelectMst] Prepared SQL: [SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NULL ORDER BY T2.ROUT_END_DT, T2.PROD_EQ_NO ,  T2.DY_NGT_FLG) AS RN        , CONVERT(VARCHAR,T2.ROUT_END_DT,23) AS MAKE_END_DT        , RIGHT(T2.PROD_EQ_NO,2) + '호기' AS EQ_NO        , CASE WHEN T2.DY_NGT_FLG = 'D' THEN '주간' ELSE '야간' END AS   DY_NGT_NM        , T3.MTRL_NM_CD    AS MDL_CD        , T2.MOLD_CD        , T3.N1ST_ITM_GRP_NM        , T3.N2ND_ITM_GRP_NM        , T5.ITM_SZ_NM        , T2.MOLD_SEQ  AS ITM_MOLD_SEQ        , T6.MOLD_CAPA_QTY        , T6.CYC_TIME        , 12           AS WRK_HRS        , T7.IDLE_MNT        , ROUND(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(MI, T2.ROUT_ST_DT, T2.ROUT_END_DT) / 60.0 <  0 THEN 0        ELSE DATEDIFF(MI, T2.ROUT_ST_DT, T2.ROUT_END_DT) / 60.0 END, 1) AS WRK_TM_VAL        , ROUND((ROUND(CASE WHEN DATEDIFF(MI, T2.ROUT_ST_DT, T2.ROUT_END_DT) / 60.0 <  0 THEN 0        ELSE DATEDIFF(MI, T2.ROUT_ST_DT, T2.ROUT_END_DT) / 60.0 END, 1) / 12) * 100, 1) AS WRK_RT_VAL        , (CASE WHEN T2.ROUT_ST_DT IS NULL OR T2.ROUT_END_DT IS NULL  THEN '비가동' ELSE '가동' END ) AS WRK_FLG        , 3600 / (T6.MOLD_CAPA_QTY *  T6.CYC_TIME* 12)             AS PROD_TGT_QTY        , 3600 / (T6.MOLD_CAPA_QTY *  T6.CYC_TIME* 12) - ((T7.IDLE_MNT *60) / (T6.MOLD_CAPA_QTY *T6.CYC_TIME))    AS PROD_PLN_QTY        , T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY AS PROD_QTY        , T2.PROD_GD_QTY        , T9.BAD_QTY        , CASE WHEN (T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(T2.PROD_GD_QTY / (T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY) * 100, 1) END AS GD_RT        , CASE WHEN (T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY) = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(T9.BAD_QTY / (T2.PROD_GD_QTY + T9.BAD_QTY) * 100, 1) END AS BAD_RT        , BAD_01_QTY        , BAD_02_QTY        , BAD_03_QTY        , BAD_04_QTY        , BAD_05_QTY        , BAD_06_QTY        , BAD_07_QTY        , BAD_08_QTY        , BAD_09_QTY        , T1.LOT_DIV_RMK  AS MM_RMK        , T2.JB_RMK   AS MM_12        FROM TB_PROD_LOT_DIV  T1        , TB_PROD_JB_ORD   T2        OUTER APPLY(        SELECT MAX(ISNULL(Z.ITM_NM, '') + '  ' + ISNULL(Z.N1ST_ITM_GRP_NM, '')) AS ITM_SZ_NM        FROM TB_PROD_JB_ITM X        , MV_TB_CD_ITM   Z        WHERE 1 = 1        AND X.CHNL_CD      =  @param0         AND X.CHNL_CD      = Z.CHNL_CD        AND X.LOT_DIV_NO   = T2.LOT_DIV_NO        AND X.LOT_DIV_SEQ  = T2.LOT_DIV_SEQ        AND X.ITM_CD       = Z.ITM_CD        ) T5        OUTER APPLY (        SELECT X.MOLD_CAPA_QTY        , X.CYC_TIME        FROM TB_PROD_MOLD_CD X        WHERE 1 = 1        AND X.CHNL_CD      =  @param0         AND X.MOLD_NO      = T2.MOLD_CD        AND X.MOLD_SEQ     = T2.MOLD_SEQ        ) T6        OUTER APPLY (        SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CAST(X.IDLE_MNT AS FLOAT)), 0) AS IDLE_MNT        FROM TB_PROD_CD_IDLE X        WHERE 1 = 1        AND X.CHNL_CD      =  @param0         AND X.LOT_DIV_NO   = T2.LOT_DIV_NO        AND X.LOT_DIV_SEQ  = T2.LOT_DIV_SEQ        ) T7        OUTER APPLY (        SELECT ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('7') THEN X.BAD_QTY END), 0)         AS BAD_01_QTY        , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('21') THEN X.BAD_QTY END), 0)        AS BAD_02_QTY        , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('23') THEN X.BAD_QTY END), 0)        AS BAD_03_QTY        , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('10', '11') THEN X.BAD_QTY END), 0)  AS BAD_04_QTY        , ISNULL(SUM(CASE WHEN X.BAD_CD IN ('9') THEN          , ITM_SZ_NM                 , PUR_QTY                , IN_QTY                , RMN_QTY                , IN_RTE                , PUR_PRC                , RMN_AMT  PUR_AMT                      , CLZ_FLG           FROM (              SELECT  PUR_DT                    , PUR_ORD_NO                    , PUR_ORD_SEQ                    , PUR_CO_CD                    , PUR_CO_NM                    , ITM_CD                    , ITM_NM                    , ITM_SZ_NM                     , PUR_DUE_DT                    , PUR_QTY                    , PUR_PRC                     , PUR_AMT                    , IN_QTY                     , CASE WHEN IN_QTY = 0 THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(IN_AMT / IN_QTY , 0) END AS IN_PRC                           , IN_AMT                    , CASE WHEN CLZ_FLG = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE RMN_QTY END AS RMN_QTY                     , CASE WHEN RMN_QTY = 0 OR CLZ_FLG = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE ROUND(RMN_AMT / RMN_QTY , 0) END AS RMN_PRC                     , CASE WHEN CLZ_FLG = 'Y' THEN 0 ELSE RMN_AMT END AS RMN_AMT                     , IN_RTE                    , CLZ_FLG                    , isCheckd                    , ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY NULL ORDER BY PUR_DT, THEN 0 ELSE   (ISNULL(T1.IN_QTY, 0) / T1.PUR_QTY) * 100 END, 0) AS IN_RTE                          , ISNULL(T4.ORD_CLZ_FLG, 'N') AS CLZ_FLG                          , (CASE WHEN ISNULL(T4.ORD_CLZ_FLG, 'N') = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS isCheckd                      FROM (                         SELECT T1.PUR_DT                        , T1.PUR_ORD_NO                        , T1.PUR_CO_CD
